item.title: End CA-37 East at I-80 and Columbus Parkway
item.description: End CA-37 East at I-80 West/San Francisco and Exit 21B - Auto Mall/Columbus Parkway. Use left lanes for I-80 East to Sacramento.

item.title: CA-37 East - Exits 19 and 20
item.description: CA-37 East at Exit 19 - CA-29/Napa/Sonoma Blvd. Approaching Exit 20 - Discovery Kingdom/Fairgrounds Drive.

item.title: CA-37 East - Exits 18 and 19
item.description: CA-37 East at Exit 18 - Wilson Ave./Sacramento St. Approaching Exit 19 - CA-29/Napa/Vallejo.

item.title: CA-37 East at CA-121
item.description: CA-37 east at CA-121 to Napa and Sonoma. Continue east on CA-37 for Vallejo and Sacramento (via I-80).

item.title: CA-37 East Approaching CA-121
item.description: CA-37 East Approaching CA-121 to Napa, Sonoma, and (Sonoma) Raceway.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 33
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 33 - CA-37/Napa/Novato/Auto Mall/Columbus Parkway. I-80 east continues to Sacramento.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 32B and Exit 33
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 32B - Redwood St West. Approaching Exit 33 - CA-37/Napa/Novato/Columbus Parkway.

item.title: End CA-37 West at US-101
item.description: End CA-37 west at US-101. US-101 continues south for San Rafael and San Francisco. Exit right for Novato Blvd.

item.title: CA-37 West at US-101
item.description: CA-37 west at US-101. Use US-101 north for Santa Rosa and Eureka. Use US-101 south for San Rafael and San Francisco. Also approaching the Novato Blvd. exit. US-101 marks the western end of CA-37.

item.title: CA-37 West - Hanna Ranch Road Exit
item.description: CA-37 west at Hanna Ranch Road exit. Approaching US-101. Use US-101 north for Santa Rosa and Eureka. Use US-101 south for San Rafael and San Francisco.

item.title: CA-37 West - Black Point Exit
item.description: CA-37 west at Black Point/Atherton Ave. interchange

item.title: CA-37 West Approaching CA-121
item.description: CA-37 west to San Rafael approaching CA-121 north to Sonoma and the Infineon Raceway.

item.title: CA-37 - San Rafael
item.description: CA-37 - San Rafael overhead on CA-37 west.

item.title: CA-37 West - Exit 17
item.description: CA-37 west at Exit 17 - Mare Island.

item.title: CA-37 West - Exits 18 and 17
item.description: CA-37 west at Exit 18 - Wilson Ave./Sacramento St. Approaching Exit 17 - Mare Island.

item.title: CA-37 West at Exits 19 and 18
item.description: CA-37 west at Exit 19 - CA-29/Napa/Sonoma Blvd. Approaching Exit 18 - Wilson Ave./Sacramento St. CA-37 continues west towards San Rafael.

item.title: CA-37 West - Exit 20
item.description: CA-37 west approaching Exit 20 - Discovery Kingdom/Fairgrounds Drive. Use Exit 20 for the Six Flags Discovery Kingdom theme park.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 33
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 33 - CA-37/Novato/San Rafael. CA-37 crosses the north end of San Pablo Bay, connecting US-101 (Novato) and I-80 (Vallejo).
